content.description: According to the chemiosmotic model proposed by Peter Mitchell in 1961, an electrochemical gradient is linked to the synthesis of ATP in mitochondria. Construct an explanation of the chemiosmotic model by doing each of the following.
content.question: Provide reasoning to explain how the evidence you presented in part (b) supports the claim you made in part (a).

frqParts.text: Provide reasoning to explain how the evidence you presented in part (b) supports the claim you made in part (a).

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
